verses.verse: “And there shall be on that day,” says the LORD, “The sound of a mournful cry from (2 Chr. 33:14; Neh. 3:3; 12:39) the Fish Gate, A wailing from the Second Quarter, And a loud crashing from the hills.
(James 5:1) Wail, you inhabitants of Maktesh! For all the merchant people are cut down; All those who handle money are cut off.

“And it shall come to pass at that time That I will search Jerusalem with lamps, And punish the men Who are (Jer. 48:11; Amos 6:1) settled in complacency, (Ps. 94:7) Who say in their heart, ‘The LORD will not do good, Nor will He do evil.’
Therefore their goods shall become booty, And their houses a desolation; They shall build houses, but not inhabit them; They shall plant vineyards, but (Deut. 28:39) not drink their wine.”
(Jer. 30:7; Joel 2:1, 11) The great day of the LORD is near; It is near and hastens quickly. The noise of the day of the LORD is bitter; There the mighty men shall cry out.
(Is. 22:5) That day is a day of wrath, A day of trouble and distress, A day of devastation and desolation, A day of darkness and gloominess, A day of clouds and thick darkness,
A day of (Is. 27:13; Jer. 4:19) trumpet and alarm Against the fortified cities And against the high towers.
“I will bring distress upon men, And they shall (Deut. 28:29) walk like blind men, Because they have sinned against the LORD; Their blood shall be poured out like dust, And their flesh like refuse.”

(Ezek. 7:19) Neither their silver nor their gold Shall be able to deliver them In the day of the LORD’s wrath; But the whole land shall be devoured By the fire of His jealousy, For He will make speedy riddance Of all those who dwell in the land.
A Call to Repentance Gather (2 Chr. 20:4; Joel 1:14; 2:16) yourselves together, yes, gather together, O undesirable nation,
Before the decree is issued, Or the day passes like chaff, Before the LORD’s fierce anger comes upon you, Before the day of the LORD’s anger comes upon you!

(Ps. 105:4; Amos 5:6) Seek the LORD, (Ps. 76:9) all you meek of the earth, Who have upheld His justice. Seek righteousness, seek humility. (Joel 2:14; Amos 5:14, 15) It may be that you will be hidden In the day of the LORD’s anger.
Judgment on NationsFor (Jer. 47:1, 5; Amos 1:7, 8; Zech. 9:5) Gaza shall be forsaken, And Ashkelon desolate; They shall drive out Ashdod (Jer. 6:4) at noonday, And Ekron shall be uprooted.

Woe to the inhabitants of (Ezek. 25:15-17) the seacoast, The nation of the Cherethites! The word of the LORD is against you, O (Josh. 13:3) Canaan, land of the Philistines: “I will destroy you; So there shall be no inhabitant.”
The seacoast shall be pastures, With shelters for shepherds (Is. 17:2) and folds for flocks.
